text:
Okappy | London | Full/Part Time | ONSITE

Okappy is an exciting new market network helping companies connect to each other, send and receive jobs and monitor the status of those jobs as they're updated by their employees AND subcontractors wherever they are.

We're growing massively, we're generating a lot of interest, we need to take on more resources, in particular a full stack developer.

http://www.okappy.com/vacancies/
